REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1749 reute r f BC-TIERCO-<TIER>-SELLS-N 04-03 0057

TEXT.TITLE: TIERCO <TIER> SELLS NOTE
TEXT.BODY: Tierco Group INc said it sold at par to the Kuwait Real Estate INvestment and Management Co its 10 mln dlrs 75. pct senior subordinated note due 1997, together with warrants to buy 1.1 mln shares of common stock. The warrant may be exercised within five years at 9.50 dlrs per share. Reuter
